block.arcanelanterns.boreal_lantern.info: Slows nearby mobs and players down, also extinguishes burning mobs.
block.arcanelanterns.brilliant_lantern.i: Turns nearby animals directly into experience.
block.arcanelanterns.cloud_lantern.info: Applies the slow fall effect in the surrounding area.
Keeps all living entities except the player confined to an area.
block.arcanelanterns.feral_lantern.info: Lights up a giant area around it by spawning sparks. When enough sparks have been spawned the lantern stops. Sparks will stay in the world while the lantern exists at the original position.
block.arcanelanterns.lantern_maker.info: To imbue a lantern the lantern maker will require a number of catalysts. Finally, place a lantern block on top to fuse everything together.
block.arcanelanterns.life_lantern.info: Makes crops around the lantern grow faster.
block.arcanelanterns.love_lantern.info: Makes nearby mobs fall in love.
block.arcanelanterns.wailing_lantern.inf: Cries if you get close, screams and applies nausea if you get even closer.
block.arcanelanterns.warding_lantern.inf: Pushes all living entities except players away.
block.arcanelanterns.withering_lantern.i: Applies the wither effect in the surrounding area.
